alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:06PM PST until March 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 1500 feet. * WHERE...Western Curry County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels could lower to 500 feet in heavier showers but winter weather advisory conditions will be above 1500 feet. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
